Name: The Libertine
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Review: Huge flavours delicately combine in this surprisingly approachable drink.
History: Created in 2008 by Joe Parrilli at Bacar, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Libertine contains 258 calories
